EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to your next Youth Board meeting!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope you were able to attend Ignite last weekend, but don't worry if not! We'd like to invite you to your first Youth Board meeting in your new borough cluster, where you will able to meeting the other members of your elite team for the rest of the year!
Hackney, Tower Hamlets & Newham Youth Board:
Your first meeting will be from 6pm - 8pm on Monday 14th December at
Theatre Royal Stratford East, Gerry Raffles Square, London E15 1BN (Gerry's Kitchen)
This will be a great chance to get to know each other properly, find out what the rest of year will look like, understand further what the Youth Board role involves and have a look back at the recent Ignite event.
Please email sarah.bax@the-challenge.org to confirm whether or not you can attend the session..
We're looking forward to seeing you there!
The Challenge Society
